$interpreted: Beyata: Good morning, sir~ I suppose you had sweet dreams after last night's service?
Arrogant Guest: Hmph, it was a bit better than usual, and yet...
Arrogant Guest: Who told said you could stand while serving me tea!?
Beyata: ─Ah! I'm so sorry!
Arrogant Guest: Don't forget your place! It's people like me that make it possible for you lot to keep your jobs here on Hot Spring Street.
Beyata: Yes, I'm very sorry, I will kneel before you, sir! Please, do not be angry with me...
Arrogant Guest: Well, then, I will see you at the same time tonight. Do not disappoint me.
Guesthouse Boss: Quick, open the door! Move it all in there, quickly!
Guesthouse Boss: Yuck, this mirror is far too plain! Throw it out! You can't have cheap things like that in here, it looks tacky!
Beyata: I-I'm sorry, boss, have I done something wrong?
Guesthouse Boss: No, no, nothing wrong... Actually, that guest just left you this gift, so you better not start slacking off now!
Beyata: A gift... that is very kind...
Guesthouse Boss: What, you don't like it!?
Beyata: No, it's not that!!
Beyata: It's just, you had said that if I did a good job you might give me some of those letters you confiscated...
Guesthouse Boss: Letters!? Why would I do that when you're at least twenty guests away from the monthly quota.
Beyata: Eh!? Twenty!? But, the month is already over, I could never serve so many guests so quickly...
Guesthouse Boss: What, you think I'm lying to you!?
Beyata: ...Eh! N-No, I wouldn't dare...!
Guesthouse Boss: Good! Think before you run your mouth, next time, I've already got enough stress as it is.
Beyata: Boss, p-please, if you wouldn't mind... at least telling me about my grandfather's condition? He's the most important person in my life, and...yagh!!
Rude Staff: And so what if he's sick!? You've been sold to Hot Spring Street, you don't have a family anymore!
Mean Staff: Quit wastin' your breath on her! Just teach her a lesson!
Beyata: Yaaaaaaaaagh──────!!!
Rude Staff: Yagh! You'd dare strike me!? That's it, get her!
Beyata: I... I want to go home...
Grandfather: *cough cough*... Please listen to your superiors, and I'll come bring you back home once I'm all better... *cough*...
Beyata: How long do I have to wait?
Guesthouse Boss: Alright, release her from her fetters.
Guesthouse Boss: Both your parents are dead, you were left in that poverty-stricken town... even your grandfather, your last of kin, is gravely ill.
Guesthouse Boss: If I weren't so kind-hearted, I would have left a rat like you to rot there!
Beyata: ...I... I'm sorry...
Guesthouse Boss: And yet I am too kind for my own good. Even this time, with your grandfather...
Beyata: What happened to my grandfather!?
Beyata: "My symptoms have worsened these past few days. If it weren't for your benevolent donation, I surely would not have made it through..."
Beyata: Wh-What donation? Boss, did you...?
Guesthouse Boss: Hmph~ Like I said, I'm too kind for my own good...
Beyata: Boss, you... you're so good to me and my grandfather... I'm so...
Cruel Staff: What? Sorry? I think it's too late for your sorries, Beyata!
Beyata: Please, I'll try harder from now on! Don't throw me out!
Guesthouse Boss: You're simply a servant! It doesn't matter how hard you try, you could never repay all you owe me!
Beyata: B-But, I can't do anything but serve guests. I don't know how to do anything else...!
Beyata: If only there were something I could do, some other way to repay you...
Guesthouse Boss: Some other way? Well, I suppose there might be...
Guesthouse Boss: But the training is rigorous...
Beyata: I don't care! I can do it! I'll do anything!
Beyata: As long as you'll let me stay here, and help my grandpa, I'll do anything!
Guesthouse Boss: Heh~ I like that spirit!
Guesthouse Boss: Then I will make something out of you yet... You will be the queen of this guesthouse!

Model.Text: Good morning, sir~ I suppose you had sweet dreams after last night's service?
Hmph, it was a bit better than usual, and yet...
Who told said you could stand while serving me tea!?
─Ah! I'm so sorry!
Don't forget your place! It's people like me that make it possible for you lot to keep your jobs here on Hot Spring Street.
Yes, I'm very sorry, I will kneel before you, sir! Please, do not be angry with me...
Well, then, I will see you at the same time tonight. Do not disappoint me.
Quick, open the door! Move it all in there, quickly!
Yuck, this mirror is far too plain! Throw it out! You can't have cheap things like that in here, it looks tacky!
I-I'm sorry, boss, have I done something wrong?
No, no, nothing wrong... Actually, that guest just left you this gift, so you better not start slacking off now!
A gift... that is very kind...
What, you don't like it!?
No, it's not that!!
It's just, you had said that if I did a good job you might give me some of those letters you confiscated...
Letters!? Why would I do that when you're at least twenty guests away from the monthly quota.
Eh!? Twenty!? But, the month is already over, I could never serve so many guests so quickly...
What, you think I'm lying to you!?
...Eh! N-No, I wouldn't dare...!
Good! Think before you run your mouth, next time, I've already got enough stress as it is.
Boss, p-please, if you wouldn't mind... at least telling me about my grandfather's condition? He's the most important person in my life, and...yagh!!
And so what if he's sick!? You've been sold to Hot Spring Street, you don't have a family anymore!
Quit wastin' your breath on her! Just teach her a lesson!
Yaaaaaaaaagh──────!!!
Yagh! You'd dare strike me!? That's it, get her!
I... I want to go home...
*cough cough*... Please listen to your superiors, and I'll come bring you back home once I'm all better... *cough*...
How long do I have to wait?
Alright, release her from her fetters.
Both your parents are dead, you were left in that poverty-stricken town... even your grandfather, your last of kin, is gravely ill.
If I weren't so kind-hearted, I would have left a rat like you to rot there!
...I... I'm sorry...
And yet I am too kind for my own good. Even this time, with your grandfather...
What happened to my grandfather!?
"My symptoms have worsened these past few days. If it weren't for your benevolent donation, I surely would not have made it through..."
Wh-What donation? Boss, did you...?
Hmph~ Like I said, I'm too kind for my own good...
Boss, you... you're so good to me and my grandfather... I'm so...
What? Sorry? I think it's too late for your sorries, Beyata!
Please, I'll try harder from now on! Don't throw me out!
You're simply a servant! It doesn't matter how hard you try, you could never repay all you owe me!
B-But, I can't do anything but serve guests. I don't know how to do anything else...!
If only there were something I could do, some other way to repay you...
Some other way? Well, I suppose there might be...
But the training is rigorous...
I don't care! I can do it! I'll do anything!
As long as you'll let me stay here, and help my grandpa, I'll do anything!
Heh~ I like that spirit!
Then I will make something out of you yet... You will be the queen of this guesthouse!
